name: ES Games
description:
Especially smart games only one click away.

Choose the game to be played in the menu, and launch it.
Play as a line and dodge the already drawn lines, drive and hit passing cars, jet through space, fight eaters as screenlooper, or wrestle with the army of unsmileness.
The choice is your's

Features

  • Download games and instantly play them with the ES Games Launcher.
  • Never need to restart when switching ES games. All games go to the launchermenu when ended.
  • Install the ES Games Launcher with more features.
  • Every game gets you one insta achievement.


If you are new to ES Games you may want to read the gameguides.
This game is free like salvation is free.
